E-Mail Messages
Date: Wednesday, 5/1/1973
Subject: Progress of Mike Kilkenny
Dear Sir,
Mike Kilkenny has nothing more to prove at AA Birmingham A's!
He has an ERA of 1.72 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Wednesday, 5/1/1973
Subject: Progress of Ken Wright
Dear Sir,
Ken Wright is doing pretty good at AA Birmingham A's!
He has an ERA of 1.05, so you might want
to promote him soon!

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Wednesday, 5/1/1973
Subject: Progress of Mike Bacsik Sr.
Dear Sir,
Mike Bacsik Sr. has an ERA of 2.41 at A Burlington Bees!
I believe he is ready for the next level!

Regards,
Scouting Director

Subject: Progress of Ivan de Jesus Sr.
Dear Sir,
Ivan de Jesus Sr. has nothing more to prove at A Burlington Bees!
He has an AVG of .306 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt him at all.

Regards,
Scouting Director

Date: Friday, 5/3/1973
Subject: Promotion Day
Dear Sir,
Congratulations, our fan interest increased slightly because
our team won on a promotion day. Good job!

Sincerly,
Your PR Director
